results.title: Gangs
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This animated work relates the story of a young naive boy’s horrific beating by a vicious student from his school. The young boy calls his older brother - a member of a gang, to avenge his beating. The older brother gathers up his friends and visits the student at his school and beats him in the school toilets. The vicious student retaliates by murdering the young boy. A bleak story of revenge.

results.title: End of the Line
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. Fleeing from town, a small child finds himself hiding in a seemingly deserted railway station. One day he is crossing the tracks when a train come hurtling towards him. A beautifully photographed film, imbued with feelings of isolation and loneliness.

group_siblings.title: Dick Sharp and the case of the missing white-out

results.title: Dick Sharp and the case of the missing white-out
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Private eye Dick Sharp gets embroiled in mystery, corruption, big business and double crossing while he endeavours to find the criminal responsible for stealing all the white-out in the city. A 1940’s noir style mystery thriller.

results.title: Danke schoen
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI secondary school media festival.
A claymation short features an older man walking along a street. He is pleased to find an old jukebox with one of his favorite songs in it. He puts a coin in the slot, but needs to insert more money. Not finding any in his pocket, he finds a bottle top on the street, picks it up and pops it into the coin slot, but the jukebox still requires more money. He decides to take off his pincenez and his nose and proceeds to put them into the jukebox, but alas, still not enough money. He proceeds to take his ears off and thankfully the machine starts to play…but can he hear the music?!

results.title: Autograph
results.brief_description: One of 6 works selected by AIM director David Atkinson as representing the best interactive work produced by the AIM centre up until 2004. An interactive work focusing on the use of eloquent graphics and innovative interface screen design for navigation. The work deals with themes such as humanity, organics and technology. A beautiful work pioneering elegant design with an innovative interface. Invited for exhibition at the Young Talent Pavilion in MILIA, France in 1995.

results.title: Crying within
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A narrative of a schizophrenic girl’s struggle to come to terms with her unstable mind and her wish to have a better life. She speaks of a faceless person, her other self, who goads her into self-mutilation and as a result suffers a recurring nightmare. A disturbing tale of the struggles of coming to terms with dealing with inner voices.

results.title: The Chase
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A fly is desperately fleeing from being eaten by a bird. As he is manically tring to escape, he thinks his time is up when he comes across a frog. Luckily for the fly, the frog is more interested in eating the bird! Just when the fly thinks he is saved from death, SPLAT!! on the windscreen of a moving car.

results.title: Perhaps, perhaps, perhaps
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This work describes a young boy’s curiosity as to what lies behind a door that he is barred from. All kinds of things occur in his imagination as to what he thinks is behind the door. Finally, he plucks up the courage to open the door…and what does he see…??

results.title: Caveboy meets Future Boy
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An animated short of a caveboy who gets killed by hunters and gets transmitted into a future world of violence and war. Robots are evil in this world and caveboy is saved from attack by Future Boy. They come together and escape from this world of fear by being teleported into another future dimension.
